elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Interpret the following organizational chart of a small retail business:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: According to which criterion is the first hierarchical level directly subordinate to the management structured?
elements.correctAnswer: The first level is organized by function.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: According to which criterion is the sales department organized?
elements.correctAnswer: The Sales department is organized according to products (divisions).

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How large is the management's span of control? Assess whether it is more of a broad or a deep structure.
elements.correctAnswer: Three departments and one staff unit (the secretariat) report to the management. This is a relatively small span of control, which means that the retail business is organized in depth.
